org.doctag.domain

Class Discount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.domain.Discount

  • public class Discount
extends Object
    Representation of a discount inside a docTag document.
    Author:
    Jochen Schalanda
    See Also:
    "docTag specification 0.5, section 2.2.5"
